name: Custom roles for author
author: David Biňovec

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to set users with custom role as post, page or custom post type author.

In addition, this plugin allows you to set what default roles (even subscriber, contributor) shoud appear in author dropdown list.

Plugin developed with WP_DEBUG set true on WordPress 3.3.1 => No notices, warnings or errors
sections.installation:
1. Download plugin
  2. Extract all files to a folder
  3. Upload folder with all files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  5. Set desired user roles to appear in authors drop down menu in Users -> Custom roles 4 author
sections.faq:
I don’t see author meta box

You must enable that box via “Screen options” tab in upper right hand corner.

short_description: Allows to set users with custom role as post author.
